item.title: Argentinean Filmmaker Sofía Petersen Embodies Tierra del Fuego in Her Arresting Locarno Title ‘Olivia’
item.description: A town of contradictions comes to life in Sofía Petersen’s debut “Olivia” which had its world premiere Aug. 13 at Locarno’s Filmmakers of the Present. Filmed on 16mm Kodak Ektachrome across a non-stop
